name: A Watched Pot Never Boils
description:
A Watched Pot Never Boils

A Watched Pot Never Boils is a pixel-art-based game centered around a simple concept.

It Is inspired by the fact that no matter how long you wait water never seems to boil if you are watching it.

V1.0.0 Out Now Coming Soon!
  • Higher quality pause screen & game over screen
  • Better looking font
  • Other minor UI improvements
  • Music
  • More SFX
  • Impossible Mode
How to play

Click anywhere on the screen to make the water boil, but watch out, water doesn't boil when watched. So, if Mr. Quacks is facing the water, DON'T CLICK. Mr. Quacks will tilt downwards before he turns to face you, so use that to your advantage.

Other Information

This is one of my first games using Unity and C# and I have really enjoyed making this game. I will continue to update and maintain it with new features regularly (I hope) and any feedback would be much appriciated.
